long_description: Built with fast-rolling 29 in. wheels and an oversize 1.5 in. headtube for nimble handling, the Cannondale Trail SL 29er 3 offers hardtail enthusiasts solid performance on singletrack. Light 6061 aluminum Trail SL 29er frame features a relaxed geometry for a stable, predictable ride; oversize 1.5 in. headtube improves strength, stiffness and handling. Rear stays are shaped to enhance comfort by damping vibration and lessening the impacts of bumps. RockShox XC30 suspension fork delivers 100mm of travel and features easy lockout and rebound adjustment for customizing the ride. Shimano Alivio/Deore Shadow drivetrain features snappy trigger shifters and derailleurs to make quick work of shifting through the 30 gear combinations. Shimano M446 hydraulic disc brakes feature a 180mm rotor up front and 160mm rotor in the back to ensure powerful, responsive and progressive braking. Burly Maddux DC3.0 rims are wrapped with WTB Nine Line tires, which offer a small block tread for speedy cross-country performance. Platform pedals mean no special bike shoes are required-just get on and pedal. Specs on the Cannondale Trail SL 29er 3 hardtail mountain bike are subject to change.
